name: TC08 - Remove product from cart on products page
description:
As a user of SauceDemo
  I want to browse and manage products
  So that I can add items to my cart

As a user of SauceDemo
I want to browse and manage products
So that I can add items to my cart

steps.name: Given  I am logged in as "standard_user" with password "secret_sauce"
And  I am on the products page
Given  I have added "sauce-labs-backpack" to the cart
When  I remove "sauce-labs-backpack" from the cart
Then  the cart badge should not be displayed
And  the product should show Add to cart button

labels.name: story
labels.value: TC08 - Remove product from cart on products page

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: TC08 - Remove product from cart on products page
